tossup_question: -   –  What is the approximate mass of the object Sagittarius A-star in solar masses?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) 4 x 10 to the 2nd power
X) 4 x 10 to the 6th power
Y) 4 x 10 to the 10th power
Z) 4 x 10 to the 16th power
tossup_answer: ANSWER: X) 4 x 10 to the 6th POWER
bonus_question: -   –  How does the intensity of light passing through an absorbing medium change as a function of optical depth?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) It decreases exponentially with the optical depth
X) It decreases as the sixth power of the optical depth
Y) It decreases as the cube of the optical depth
Z) It decreases as the square of the optical depth
bonus_answer: ANSWER: W) IT DECREASES EXPONENTIALLY WITH THE OPTICAL DEPTH
